name: Elephant House Orange Crush
description: Elephant House Orange Crush epitomizes everything that’s great about romance and giving your heart to someone else. Playful, thrilling, and exuberant, Elephant House Orange Crush, makes your special moments even more special, especially when its sweet orange taste is shared with the one you love. Fresh and sweet, just like the first few moments of young love. Less fizzy than other orange flavoured drinks in the local market, Elephant House Orange Crush is nevertheless a deliciously decadent and simply refreshing take on an international classic.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
